verses.roman:
śīghra yāi' muñi saba karinu bhakṣaṇa
śūnya-pātra dekhi' aśru kariyā mārjana

synonyms: śīghra—very soon; yāi'-going; muñi—I; saba—all; karinu bhakṣaṇa—ate; śūnya-pātra dekhi'-seeing the dish empty; aśru—tears; kariyā mārjana—smearing with her hands.
translation: "While she was thus thinking and crying, I immediately went there with great haste and ate everything. Seeing the dish empty, she wiped her tears away.
